column5: APRN Just checking in at the end of the day Good to see my speculative play is still trading
APRN this is going to be fun holding through RS 10 shares for 1 share with 10x the value
CLDR UNFKN BELIEVABLE THIS IS NOT APRN

APRN The Blue Apron investors relations must come up and assure the shareholders that they are on the right track They lost a significant value since ER May 1st and it is very normal for the shareholders to get panicked
APRN For every 100 shares 10 shares and than 10 shares will 1 share after two RS

APRN Huge call options for January 2020 Good call options for mid July Big insides ownerships 150 avg analyst price target Something good will happen which should help the shareholders At this price level I want to believe its a very good buy

APRN 2 Reasons for reverse split First they need large institutional investments to do something big But the institution wont but if the share price stays below 5 due to their investment guidelines Secondly the new funding will allow them to go big on expansion or execute new ideas which might make them a better target for a merger or acquisition They already had partnerships with Costco they are working with Walmart and weight watchers Fitbit right now I want to believe that share price and values goes up post reveres spit significantly This is not a typical RS this should work out for them well
